answers.answer: ask for more testing , are you drinking plenty of water as dehydration can make it worse ..usually urine is dark

Hello and hope you are doing well.Hope diabetes has been ruled. This could cause persisting or recurring infections. Have yourself evaluated for this. This can be detected by a simple blood test.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Hii'm suffering from urine problem since 02 months.... when i passed urine it's color is pale and bad smelling also. and i had back ache also. i have done urine culture and ufr also. dr diagnosed it's a urine infection and given some medicine also. i took it for 2 weeks. but the problem is still there...Nataliya
title: Urine infection
